description: A light, insulated jacket that is tough and comfortable for the journeys ahead. This insulated, cotton-blend jacket has tons of pockets and is tough and comfortable for the journeys ahead. Zippered hand pockets secure small belongings, while the D-ring attachment allows you to clip on any extra adventure gear.
name: Columbia Sportswear Rad Padded Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 150g Microtemp XF II 85% Recycled Polyester, 15% Polyester
Universal, easy fit for comfortable range of motion
